title: Rainy night city driving, ego vehicle almost stopped, braking frequently
caption: A red car drives on a rainy city street at night, with a bus behind it.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a rainy city street at night. There are tall buildings on both sides of the street. The road is wet and slippery. The traffic is light, with only a few cars driving in the opposite direction. The bus behind the red car is also driving slowly, following at a safe distance.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rainy and slippery road conditions. The frequent braking events indicate that the driver is being cautious and trying to maintain a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The presence of the bus behind the red car suggests that the traffic is moving slowly overall, possibly due to the weather conditions.
